policy.name: DCR
policy.description: governs the normal processing of an DCR

user.name: Senior Manufacturing Engineer
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_SeniorManufacturingEngineer] == true

user.name: Manufacturing Engineer
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_ManufacturingEngineer] == true

user.name: ECR Coordinator
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_ECRCoordinator] == true

user.name: ECR Chairman
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_ECRChairman] == true

user.name: Senior Design Engineer
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_SeniorDesignEngineer] == true

user.name: Design Engineer
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_DesignEngineer] == true

user.name: ECR Chairman
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_ECRChairman] == true

user.name: ECR Coordinator
user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_ECRCoordinator] == true

user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_ECRCoordinator] == true

user.filter: to[Design Responsibility] !='True' && program[emxOrganization -method hasRDOrole -construct ${OBJECTID} role_ECRChairman] == true
